method: In a mixing bowl, cream together butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
In a separate bowl, combine flour and baking powder.
Gradually add the dry ingredients mixture to the wet ingredients mixture, mixing until just combined.
Cover the cookie dough and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
Roll out the chilled cookie dough on a lightly floured surface.
Cut out chat sticker shapes using cookie cutters.
Place the cookies on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
Bake for 8-10 minutes or until the edges are golden brown.
Let the cookies cool completely on a wire rack.
Prepare the royal icing according to the package instructions and divide into different colors.
Decorate the cooled cookies with royal icing using chat sticker designs.
Melt white chocolate and dark chocolate separately.
Use melted chocolate to draw additional details on the decorated cookies.
Let the chocolate set completely before serving.
Enjoy the tasty and fun Chat Sticker Cookies!
